document_data.mainbody:
Eilistraee Lady Silverhair was a book that, unsurprisingly, collected the mortals knowledge on the topic of Eilistraee, a benevolent drow deity. It was published in or before the late 15 century DR.
The book offered a close and personal look into the story of Eilistraee, sparing no detail. It chronicled the deitys life, death at the hands of her mother, Lolth, and rebirth in the Second Sundering.
A copy of Eilistraee Lady Silverhair was kept among the religious books of the Stormshore Tabernacle, a multi-denominational shrine in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate circa the .
